participant_1.background:
I love to learn about the universe and everything in it, so I spend my days reading science books, watching documentaries, and exploring nature.
I treasure my computer because it's how I make my music.
My most valuable possession is my intellect, which I plan to use to take over the world.
I loved spending hours in the woods behind my house, making up stories and worlds.
i ride my bike to class since its only a mile away.

i like to arm wrestle.
i married miss usa.

content.text: I love learning about the universe! I spend my days reading science books, watching documentaries, and exploring nature. What are your hobbies?

I have a large family, and we love to go on adventures together. We also love to read and garden. I like to listen to music as a way to relax after a day of welding and working towards my goal of skydiving. What about you?
I also like to read, but my favorite hobby is making music. I have a computer that I use to make all sorts of different sounds.
That's awesome! What kind of music do you make?
I make a lot of different genres, but my favorite is probably electronic music. I like to experiment with different sounds and create something new and exciting.
That's so cool! I would love to hear some of your music sometime.
I'd love to share it! I can send you a link to my soundcloud or something.
Awesome, I'll send you a link later today.
